name: Banarasi Silk Saree
description: A classic Banarasi saree with intricate zari work, perfect for grand celebrations.

name: Printed Cotton Kurti Set
description: A comfortable and stylish three-piece kurti set for everyday wear.

name: Embroidered Georgette Gown
description: A contemporary georgette gown with delicate thread embroidery, ideal for evening parties.

name: Chanderi Anarkali Suit
description: A lightweight Anarkali suit with a traditional Chanderi weave, suitable for lighter festive occasions.

name: Heavy Border Kanjivaram Saree
description: A luxurious silk saree from Kanjivaram with a grand, contrasting zari border, a wedding essential.

name: Mirror Work Lehenga Choli Set
description: A stunning Ghagra Choli with intricate mirror work and embroidery, perfect for Sangeet or Garba nights.

name: Plain Viscose Palazzo Suit
description: A simple yet elegant straight-cut suit with palazzo pants in soft viscose, ideal for business casual or daily comfort.

name: Patola Silk Double Ikat Saree
description: An authentic Patola saree known for its complex double ikat weave and vibrant geometric patterns, a heirloom piece.

name: Lucknowi Chikankari Salwar Suit
description: A delicate cotton salwar suit featuring traditional hand-embroidered Chikankari work from Lucknow.
occasion: Summer Wear, Casual, Formal Day Event

name: Bandhani Art Silk Saree
description: A lightweight art silk saree featuring vibrant Bandhani (tie-dye) patterns, easy to drape for festivals.

name: Velvet Embroidered Sherwani
description: A royal velvet Sherwani with heavy zardozi embroidery, traditionally worn by grooms or for very formal events.

name: Ikkat Print Cotton Dupatta Set
description: A modern three-piece suit set with an Ikkat patterned dupatta and solid kurta for office wear.

name: Zari Work Pattu Pavadai (Kids)
description: A traditional South Indian long skirt and blouse set for young girls, featuring simple zari motifs.

name: Phulkari Embroidered Dupatta Suit
description: A Punjabi suit set featuring a vibrant dupatta with traditional Phulkari (floral) threadwork from Punjab.

name: Kalamkari Printed Cotton Saree
description: A comfortable cotton saree with intricate hand-painted or block-printed Kalamkari motifs depicting scenes.

name: Heavy Brocade Kurta Pyjama
description: A traditional men's outfit made of heavy brocade fabric with subtle golden self-design.

name: Tussar Silk Handloom Saree
description: A lightweight saree woven from Tussar silk, known for its rich texture and natural golden sheen.
